Reviews.Title: One Giant Step Forward
Reviews.Author: Scott  Pearson
Reviews.Content: Had HTC, other windows operating smart phones. Got rid of them! All lasted less than a year. Bought two of these new from Sprint 2 years ago. I absolutely love it. I believe Jack Bower (24) used the exact same phone in season six! My wife and I direct connect all the time. Check this out. My company, who issues the Motorola Android on the Sprint network for a company phone, when they cannot get to me, they call my personal phone to get through! Phone is rugged, speaker phone is loud, and has a solid feel to it. Easy to operate and read. Battery is two years old and still will last me all day unless I activate my bluetooth. Then it's 8 hours standby, half hour talk time and it's goodbye.One bug is that sometimes when I get another incomming call, the phone just goes blank for 5 seconds, then comes back. It does not power down, it just goes dead and releases both callers. Ask Sprint about this and the told me I need a software update. However, researching this, the last revision software was in 2009 so it was total BS.Just yesterday I dropped this phone. No big deal because I have dropped it so many times before. I called my cell from the work cell and heard it ring. I traced my Sanyo underneath my truck totally submerged in a huge puddle of water!!(Can't make this stuff up). Yes, it rang underwater! However, the sad news is that shortly after, my screen went blank. Took out the battery and now it is sitting in a baggie full of rice (trick to obsorb water in electronics that got wet). Today, the phone still works, outgoing and incoming, but my screen is still blank. Another day in the baggie and if it doesn't come back, I get it repair or buy another one. I called Sprint today and they no longer offer this phone. If you want a no frills phone, just to make calls and direct connect, this is the one!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Thank you. Item was delivered very quickley, super good shape, works awesome. My grandfather needed a new phone but just a simple, durable one and he loves it. Will definately order again and would recommend to anyone. Awesome, quick, reliable.

Reviews.Title: Yess!!
Reviews.Author: Boba
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone!! dropped it from a good height and it still worked! :D very handy if you work on a construction site or are outdoors camping!! The service is great and i didn't even have to use my 30 day guarantee :D The phone came right on time :3

Reviews.Title: Best phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Cowart
Reviews.Content: Went for a Palm pre back to a regular phone god its been great i hate everything about smart phones this phone dose its duty and never has a issues

Reviews.Title: A Spring store worker says won't work soon
Reviews.Author: S. Hardwick
Reviews.Content: I got this phone when I lost another similar phone. This phone fairly rugged as far as cell phones go, and it worked just fine. When I found the lost phone, I went to the Sprint store to get service put back where it was. The service representative said that this phone is a Nextel phone, and that Sprint was shutting down that network of cell towers by June. He said that after that happens, this phone will not get service on the Sprint network.Update: Another Sprint store worker told someone else something different. See the comments. I've edited the title of the review to reflect that my information is based only on what one worker told me.

Reviews.Title: Should still be with us!!
Reviews.Author: kiethesellsxxx
Reviews.Content: Sanyo made a mistake with the Tahoe, the replacement for this phone. The antenna is badly positioned, the side keys still let you pocket-dial (even with the lock on), and there is no directory access from the closed position. All of these were handled with aplomb by the PRO-700, and believe me, I have one I ordered from Amazon on stand-by if the Tahoe continues to misbehave. See Sanyo - it was better without the camera!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone all around
Reviews.Author: Mike T. "Big Hoss"
Reviews.Content: If you're like me and don't need a camera or the internet on your phone, and you happen to get out in the woods or the mountains from time to time, this is a great phone. I've had it for 2 years now, and I've only just begun having problems - and that has a lot to do with the abuse it has taken in stride. I managed to crack the front screen recently, but with an impact that probably would have shattered other phones. I've also found the battery life to be spectacular, provided you are in an area with good reception.Now, looking for a replacement, I am a little depressed that everything is either a smart phone or a piece of garbage (or both). There are a few "rugged" phones out there, but nothing that really catches my eye like this one did. I may have to order the same phone again...

Reviews.Title: Replacement Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: UCP
Reviews.Content: Good phone not sure if I missed it was without battery.  When ordering the phone make sure it has a battery, ordering it separately brings the phone price higher than you might expect.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy phone
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: phone arrived quickly,with all needed items. I needed a sturdy, reliable phone and this is perfect. Not very stylish, but that's not what I need!

Reviews.Title: Sprint Sanyo Pro 700
Reviews.Author: Heather Collins
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband to replace his very heavy and cumbersome company cell phone. He loved it! As far as direct connect phones go, this one is great. It's just a little heavier then a pair of sunglasses and very compact. It has an extra large screen and GPS. The features are basic but handles as a phone should. It's also very rugged looking. I just wish it had a camera.

Reviews.Title: good phone but make sure seller did not tamper
Reviews.Author: nice
Reviews.Content: this is a really good basic phone. it is sturdy, speaker is great, sound volume is great...overall nice basic phone. but be careful buying b/c we bought two exact phone, one was defective and not working properly b/c whoever definitely tampered with it and did not inform us. we returned that phone. the other phone was sold by Brown Box Bonanza. the phone is used but worked great! BBB are fantastic with service! very prompt, kind and helpful! if you need used or new phones, i would definitely recommend buying from BBB.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement
Reviews.Author: nhfrenchie
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted, phone arrived promptly and works great.Replaced an old phone that I liked a lot, not needing all thebells and whistles in a cell phone for me.

Reviews.Title: sanyo pro
Reviews.Author: len cucinotta
Reviews.Content: Sprint Sanyo Pro fits all my needs plus it is not subject to scratches on the out side case,(I carry my phone in my pocket with change and keys)

Reviews.Title: Pleased with the Sanyo Pro 700
Reviews.Author: Randall Wallace
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in good condition. We were pleasantly surprised at the strength of the battery...so far, good capacity. It is the first phone for my son and he likes it.  I wish an owners manual had come with the phone.

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: ahmed shirza
Reviews.Content: al thought the device is basic phone and old , but it have every thing u need at work site , strong ,high performance ,signal ,high duribility ,and the most important thing ,so light the weight is nothing .cool phone

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: John G. Hofmann
Reviews.Content: No more smartphone, thank God.  I got so tired of texting and all that crap.  It's durable, the battery lasts forever and it's simple to use.  The speakerphone is really loud too!

Reviews.Title: Durable but with issues
Reviews.Author: richard granata
Reviews.Content: One positive phone is very durable - came with no instructions. When my wife speaks into the phone it sounds like she is in a well and can hardly hear her - this does not happen with all phones - but alot - everyone cpmlains about it. Probably have to buy here another phone.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware!
Reviews.Author: gadget  roland
Reviews.Content: this phone looked like it was used for 10 years! it was supposed to be brand new when i sent back phone still have no response after 3 months i give up!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: John Beckstead
Reviews.Content: This phone was an excellent choice, as it works well and keeps a good charge on it. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: Amanda Pasternak
Reviews.Content: Very durable, but very old. A far cry from a smart phone. It doesn't even take pictures, but if you want something that will last.....its your friend!

Reviews.Title: It was okay
Reviews.Author: KYAZIA "KYAZIA"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I needed a device for work and it did its job, plain and simple.  Nothing fancy, just a basic used phone with obvious signs of use.

Reviews.Title: Pretty pleased with this purchase.
Reviews.Author: Steffney L. Pearce
Reviews.Content: I've bought several used phones just like this.  I love this phone, because I'm rough with my stuff.  It was a bit pricy, but not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Like New
Reviews.Author: Luis Oquendo
Reviews.Content: This phone was like it had not ever been used. Works like a charm and saved me money in the long run with my plans. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Rugged Phone
Reviews.Author: Springcreek
Reviews.Content: My husband is in construction, hates technology and loves this phone. It is rugged and holds up to the torture he inflicts on it. He has dropped it from a roof and gotten it wet. It does not have a camera and checking picture mail takes a long time, but he isn't tech savvy so those things do not bother him. He has big fingers and is able to push only the buttons he wants to.

Reviews.Title: Nextel or Sprint
Reviews.Author: themlkman
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to be of pour quality, toy like. Not RUGGED as discribed to me in fact I took it to a Sprint store to confirm it was  ok. When turning it on it says Nextel on the screen. This is concerning to me because I don't think Sprint will be offering Nextel phones in the future. Check with Sprint before purchasing this phone. They also may charge you to return it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Diana Miller
Reviews.Content: We wanted a regular tough phone without all the gadgets - and that is exactly what we got. The only real drawback is that it does not have a camera - which I neglected to notice.Other than that - the sound is good - the font is large - and so far the service has been great!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my mom and she loves it.  She is not into smartphones and this one was just what she needed.

Reviews.Title: bad deal
Reviews.Author: Lamar
Reviews.Content: out of a rugged phone you expect to put it to the test so far the silver finish on the front is peeling off and the speaker phone does not work to were people can hear you on the other line, my older grand father sprint phone worked better,, that one survived a spin in the washer and they  did not guarantee water proof,just let sit out for a day to dry worked but lost the display, also the finish piled off like the pro 700 the cost was 50.00for the grand father, would prefer to go back to the older model better price, no need to search web or text while working and at home

Reviews.Title: easy to read
Reviews.Author: R. Pettingell "uneektalent"
Reviews.Content: Sometimes the speaker phone button doesn't work but all else is fine. It's so nice to be able to find exactly what I need in just a few clicks. Thank you for a great quality product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo Pro 700 cell phone
Reviews.Author: Marco Verbon
Reviews.Content: This is a very good phone. It may not have all the bells and whistles, but it is very durable and reliable.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed
Reviews.Author: Kathy Chaffin
Reviews.Content: This phone was exactly as it was described & therefore exactly what I wanted.  Very pleased!!!  Would definitely order from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: works for what we needed it for
Reviews.Author: Ruqayyah
Reviews.Content: phone lasts forever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Husband has broken every other phone hes had, this one is still ticking, its lasted the longest and probably got treated the wort!

Reviews.Title: Needed a phone quick
Reviews.Author: SuZan McRae
Reviews.Content: My husband needed a new phone it needed to be received quickly, cheaply and needed to be very rugged.  Well this was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good flip phone
Reviews.Author: Luca Roseano
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in few days. I did not have any problems to activate the phone with Sprint. I was able to move all my contacts, the phone can store 600 contacts. The battery last 5 days without recharging. The response to my imputs is sometime slow. It is made by rubber, perfect if you have kids. I know what I was going to get and I am happy with it. It is not a smart phone, but if you need a simple phone I think you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: good ol' flip phones
Reviews.Author: PRB
Reviews.Content: This is a tough phone ! I do a lot of field work and constantly have grimy hands.  It is still going strong!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my husband
Reviews.Author: weizel
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband because we needed to downgrade (to save money) and he needed a more durable phone (he broke his smartphone twice because of dropping it). This phone is durable, sleek, and works great for phone calls and texting. It's very basic but it's all we need at the moment, very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Karen L Wagoner
Reviews.Content: thanks for the fast service.  works great.  i will buy it again.  i think that this phone is great for oldies who want just a phone

Reviews.Title: great phone,
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: got this phone for the basic phone and text plan.  works great and thespeakerphone works great.  its rugged so no problem if you drop it.received fast and all as promised. new in the box.

Reviews.Title: Great rugged phone
Reviews.Author: Stacy M. Mendoza
Reviews.Content: This phone is rugged in look and feel and function. I especially loved that large display in the front. Shipping was quicker than expected, which is always a huge plus. Though be aware that you cannot simply switch sim cards on this as there is no sim card slot. You must call into your carrier and have them activate the phone for you so you might get hit with an activation fee.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a non-tech husband
Reviews.Author: JulieB "Julie"
Reviews.Content: This phone has worked out great for someone who uses a cell phone as a phone and doesn't need all the extra bells and whistles.  Does it have some extra features? Yes, text, GPS, and simple net access...and that's just enough. Very pleased with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Claudia J. Williamson
Reviews.Content: It is a nice phone, it went to someone who is very hard on phones and it seams to be holding up his abuse. Only time will tell for sure.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Kim R.
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived before expected and was just as described. New phone - in original box, with all sealing stickers and protective phone stickers. Obviously brand new and works like a charm. Great phone and will probably order another one!

Reviews.Title: not so rugged
Reviews.Author: Zachary Degarmeaux "Zac"
Reviews.Content: this was my 5th and final pro 700 since 2008. Batteries and screen dont last long. Reception was so so.Changing this to a 1 star review. These just dont last or wear well like they advertise. So bad now I have to leave sprint all together as there is nothing comparable left I can find to work.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Sprint Sanyo Pro 700 Cell Phone Rugged
